name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Welcome to the enchanting world of Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles!
Immerse yourself in a captivating realm of Victorian aesthetics and intricate machinery as you embark on your puzzle-solving adventure.
Assemble a wide variety of fascinating scenes, from opulent airships to ornate clockwork contraptions and much more.

Enjoy a selection of 24 steampunk puzzles, expandable to over 200 with DLC.
With its intuitive gameplay, Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles is accessible to both newcomers and puzzle enthusiasts alike.
Play the game your way, with a wide variety of puzzle sizes and piece shapes. Enjoy a leisurely experience, or face a mind-bending test of your puzzling prowess!
Solve jigsaw puzzles to earn Steam achievements and unlock hidden bonus puzzles.

The gears are in motion. Begin your steampunk puzzle adventure!
